explanation: Diane claims she was setting up the boardroom from 6:50 to 8 AM. But Clue 1 shows her credentials were used on a third-floor workstation between 6:30 and 7:30 AM â€” she was on the third floor, not the second-floor boardroom. Clue 2 confirms the janitor saw her with coffee at 6:55 AM heading to the boardroom, but Diane had time to detour to the third floor to modify the file at 7:12 AM. Clue 3 clears Owen, as he was still at the gym twenty minutes away.
funFact: A 2019 survey found that 45% of employees have witnessed a coworker deliberately sabotage someone else's work at least once.
